name: The ORGANizer
description:
One day you receive a tempting offer on your pager. ORGANize a liver and bathe in riches. You don't have a liver at hand? Just kindly "ask" one of the other patients then. What are you waiting for???

Credits

The LiverLovers, namely:

  • Maximilian Reiß
  • Artjom Fransen (cwsketchbook.tumblr.com/
  • Gina Vörde (rainbowrat.com)
  • Jonas Zimmer
  • Simon Schliesky (plantandplay.eu)

Music (Professor Umlaut) by Kevin MacLeod (CC-BY 3.0)

Source Code

Sources (Unity3D Project) available under https://gitlab.com/PlantProgrammer/organspender2016

Controls

WASD for movement. E to interact. R might or might not work to restart.
